name: ads
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "ads" %}
{% set version = "0.12.3" %}
{% set sha256 = "ce523f266f6b815bf1d6371b6e7791b4d10989ebe743681b27bd54301f7cdcc9" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}
  patches:
    - httpretty.patch

build:
  number: 1
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python
    - werkzeug
    - mock
    - requests
    - six

test:
  imports:
    - ads

about:
  home: http://github.com/andycasey/ads
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  summary: 'A Python interface to NASA ADS.'

  description: |
     ads implements a Python interface to NASA ADS's API.
  doc_url: http://ads.readthedocs.io/
  dev_url: https://github.com/andycasey/ads

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - guillochon
    - pkgw

about.description: ads implements a Python interface to NASA ADS's API.
about.summary: A Python interface to NASA ADS.
